state.unicode: The bonds one shares with another transcend loyalty to any one nation, and may help find unity in the end.

state.data: 9c 02 82 c5 44 b5 c7 46 bb d6 f3 f9 29 ab 9f b3
state.unicode: There can be no quarter when dealing with this most hated foes. In battle, as in life, only death will end this feud.
